bilibili.watchingStream.description: Shown when watching a live stream

bilibili.multiUploaderName.description: Shown when multiple uploaders are present

bilibili.browsingSearchCategory.description: Shown when browsing a specific search category

bilibili.viewingArticle.description: Display when viewing image and text content posted by users

bilibili.articleTypePost.description: User-posted image and text content without a title, originally named "动态"

bilibili.articleTypeColumn.description: User-generated image and text content with titles, originally named "专栏"

bilibili.searchingForSomething.description: Displayed when searching in private mode
